info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 27 at 5:49PM MST until September 27 at 7:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
info.description:
FFWPSR
The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona...
* Until 745 PM MST.
* At 549 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Jackrabbit Wash and Winters Wash. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Tonopah.
This includes AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 93 and 97.
This includes the following streams and drainages... Woodchopper Wash, Dead Horse Wash, Star Wash, Winters Wash, Coyote Wash, Beer Bottle Wash, Centennial Wash, Fourmile Wash, Jackrabbit Wash, Old Camp Wash and Delaney Wash.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 7:45 PM MST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 7:45 PM MST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 27 at 5:49PM MST until September 27 at 7:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 7:45 PM MST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 7:45 PM MST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
